22-004FA.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the Finance Authority of Long Beach meeting held Tuesday, March 29, 2022.A motion was made by Member Riper, seconded by Member Nakamoto, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Nakamoto and RiperAbsent: 1 - Modica2.

22-005FA.summary: Recommendation to adopt resolution of the Board of Directors of the Finance Authority of Long Beach authorizing investment of monies in the local investment fund.Page 1 of 2411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 9:00 AMTUESDAY, APRIL 5, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHFINANCE AUTHORITY OF LONG BEACH MINUTESA motion was made by Member Riper, seconded by Member Nakamoto, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. F.A.L.B. 2022-02.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Nakamoto and RiperAbsent: 1 - ModicaEnactment No: F.A.L.B. 2022-023.
